calibration_metrics.assessment: System is miscalibrated. Brier 0.3171 > 0.30 threshold. Hit rate 40.7% indicates systematic bias toward incorrect predictions.

execution_metrics.assessment: No capital deployed. System is in observation/learning mode only.

epistemic_metrics.assessment: 81.4% wisdom rate indicates suppression mechanism is learning. 16.6% regret rate is within acceptable bounds.

data_coverage.assessment: 77.2% coverage achieved (up from 4.5% baseline). Remaining gaps: GLD (2431), TLT (689), REGIME (903).

section_ii_single_goal_for_tomorrow.goal: Achieve >90% Forecast-Outcome Coverage via CEIO GLD/TLT Price Backfill
section_ii_single_goal_for_tomorrow.rationale: Current coverage at 77.2%. Missing GLD (2431) and TLT (689) price data blocks 3120 forecasts from reconciliation. CEIO backfill will unlock 94.7% coverage. This is prerequisite to accurate Brier calibration.
section_ii_single_goal_for_tomorrow.success_criteria: fhq_market.prices contains GLD and TLT prices for 2025-12-01 through 2026-01-09

blockers.resolution: Improve forecasting accuracy before capital deployment

blockers.description: No capital allocated for paper trading
blockers.resolution: CEO to authorize initial paper capital allocation

eta_to_economic_freedom.reason: System must first demonstrate consistent calibration (Brier < 0.30, Hit Rate > 50%) before ETA can be calculated. Current metrics show miscalibration.
preconditions: Paper trading shows positive Sharpe Ratio

section_iii_on_track_to_economic_freedom.honest_assessment: FjordHQ has built the infrastructure for revenue-seeking autonomy. Governance is operational. Mandates are closed. Revenue activation is authorized. But the forecasting engine is currently WRONG more often than RIGHT (40.7% hit rate). We cannot deploy capital until this is fixed. This is not a governance problem. This is a calibration problem. FINN must improve.

raw_queries.brier_score_query: SELECT ROUND(AVG(brier_score)::numeric, 4) as avg_brier, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE hit_rate_contribution = true) as correct, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE hit_rate_contribution = false) as incorrect FROM fhq_research.forecast_outcome_pairs WHERE brier_score IS NOT NULL
raw_queries.capital_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as position_count, COALESCE(SUM(ABS(notional_usd)), 0) as total_exposure_usd FROM fhq_execution.paper_positions
raw_queries.defcon_query: SELECT defcon_level, triggered_by, trigger_reason FROM fhq_governance.defcon_state WHERE is_current = true
raw_queries.suppression_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE regret_classification = 'REGRET') as regret, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE regret_classification = 'WISDOM') as wisdom FROM fhq_governance.epistemic_suppression_ledger

closing_statement.text: Day 1. No mercy on ourselves. The system is authorized to seek revenue but not yet calibrated to earn it. Tomorrow we close the data gap. Then we fix the predictions.
